title: Grand Hotel
description: A group of very different individuals staying at a luxurious hotel in Berlin deal with each of their respective dramas.

title: Scarface
description: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

title: Freaks
description: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of side-show performers, but his deformed friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.

title: Trouble in Paradise
description: A gentleman thief and a lady pickpocket join forces to con a beautiful perfume company owner.

title: I Am a Fugitive from a Chain Gang
description: Wrongly convicted James Allen serves time in a chain gang, escapes, and tries to build a new life while always looking over his shoulder.

title: Shanghai Express
description: Multiple passengers on a train from Peking to Shanghai are held hostage by a warlord, including a notorious 'coaster' and her former lover.

title: The Mummy
description: A living mummy stalks the beautiful woman he believes is the reincarnation of his ancient lover.

title: Vampyr
description: A traveler obsessed with the supernatural visits a French castle and finds that the lord of the manor and his daughter are falling under the spell of a vampire.

title: Love Me Tonight
description: A Parisian tailor poses as a baron in order to collect a bill from an aristocrat, only to fall in love with an aloof princess.

title: Red Dust
description: On a rubber plantation in Indochina during the monsoon season, the overseer finds himself torn between a streetwise hooker and the elegant wife of his new engineer.

title: Horse Feathers
description: Quincy Adams Wagstaff, the new president of Huxley University, accidentally hires bumblers Baravelli and Pinky to help his school win the big football game against rival Darwin University.

title: The Old Dark House
description: Stranded travelers stumble upon a strange old house, and find themselves at the mercy of a highly eccentric and potentially dangerous family.

title: Island of Lost Souls
description: A shipwrecked traveler lands on a mysterious island ruled by Dr. Moreau, a scientist who performs horrific experiments on animals to turn them into humans.

title: White Zombie
description: A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fiancé, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.

title: A Farewell to Arms
description: An American ambulance driver and an English nurse fall in love in Italy during World War I.

title: Tarzan the Ape Man
description: A trader and his daughter set off in search of the fabled Elephant Graveyard, only to encounter a wild man raised by apes.

title: The Sign of the Cross
description: A Roman prefect falls in love with a Christian woman during the reign of Nero, testing his loyalty to the Emperor.

title: One Way Passage
description: A terminally ill woman and a condemned murderer fall in love on a ship bound for San Francisco, unaware of each other's secrets.

title: Three on a Match
description: The lives of three women from the same elementary school take drastically different paths after they reunite as adults.

title: The Most Dangerous Game
description: A madman on a remote island hunts humans for sport.

title: Doctor X
description: A reporter investigates a series of cannibalistic murders at a medical college.

title: Boudu Saved from Drowning
description: A bookseller rescues a tramp from a suicide attempt in the Seine, but the tramp proceeds to sow chaos in his savior's household.

title: I Was Born, But...
description: Two young brothers go on a hunger strike when they discover their father is a subservient employee who bows down to his boss.

title: A Bill of Divorcement
description: A mental asylum escapee returns home on Christmas Day to meet his daughter for the first time, only to find his wife has divorced him and is about to remarry.

title: The Mask of Fu Manchu
description: Evil Fu Manchu races the British expedition team to the tomb of Genghis Khan to find a sword that will allow him to conquer the world.

title: Murders in the Rue Morgue
description: A mad scientist seeks to mix human and ape blood to create a mate for his talking ape, and resorts to kidnapping women for his experiments.

title: Pack Up Your Troubles
description: Laurel and Hardy accidentally get drafted into WWI and return home to care for a fallen comrade's infant daughter while searching for her grandparents.

title: Rasputin and the Empress
description: The story of the mad monk Rasputin and his influence over the Russian Royal Family in the years leading up to the Russian Revolution.

title: American Madness
description: A bank president is put in a difficult position when a robbery takes place and board members accuse him of incompetence.

title: Rain
description: A prostitute and a fire-and-brimstone missionary clash on a South Seas island.

title: Call Her Savage
description: A wild Texas girl has a tumultuous relationship with men, leading to a life of heartache and scandal.

title: Merrily We Go to Hell
description: A drunken playwright marries a society girl but cannot stay faithful, leading her to engage in an affair of her own.

title: Me and My Gal
description: A wisecracking detective falls for a waitress, but their romance is complicated by her sister's involvement with a gangster.

title: Blonde Venus
description: A former cabaret singer returns to the stage to pay for her husband's medical treatment, but complicates matters by falling for a wealthy playboy.

title: Million Dollar Legs
description: The nutty President of Klopstokia enters his country in the Olympics to save it from bankruptcy.

title: Movie Crazy
description: A small-town boy heads to Hollywood with dreams of becoming a star, but his clumsiness leads to a series of mishaps.

title: What Price Hollywood?
description: A waitress becomes a movie star with the help of an alcoholic director, but his downfall threatens her success.

title: Tiger Shark
description: A tuna fisherman marries the daughter of a man he couldn't save, but she falls for his best friend.

title: The Big Broadcast
description: A radio station manager tries to save his failing station by hosting an all-star variety show.

title: Smilin' Through
description: A young woman falls in love with the son of her guardian's enemy, mirroring a tragic romance from the past.

title: Strange Interlude
description: A woman's life is defined by her relationships with three men: her husband, her lover, and her son.

title: The Crowd Roars
description: A champion race car driver tries to keep his younger brother from following in his footsteps.

title: Taxi!
description: Independent taxi drivers fight a taxi trust that uses violence and intimidation to muscle in on their territory.

title: Jewel Robbery
description: A bored baroness becomes infatuated with a suave jewel thief who robs her.

title: 20,000 Years in Sing Sing
description: A cocky gangster enters Sing Sing prison, but his girlfriend's desperate attempts to help him lead to tragedy.

title: Night After Night
description: An ex-boxer buys a speakeasy and tries to improve his class standing, but his old girlfriend shows up to complicate things.

title: Broken Lullaby
description: A French musician, haunted by the memory of a German soldier he killed in WWI, travels to Germany to find the soldier's family.

title: Arsène Lupin
description: The French police detective Guerchard battles the master thief Arsène Lupin.

title: The Beast of the City
description: A police captain zealously pursues a gang leader, while his own brother falls under the spell of a gangster's moll.

title: If I Had a Million

director.name: Ernst Lubitsch, Norman Taurog, and others

description: A dying tycoon gives a million dollars to eight strangers picked from the phone book.
